images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, young Japanese idol with flawless yet realistic skin texture and a fit, curvy physique, immersed in a whimsical Steampunk aesthetic. She stands amidst a vibrant sea of blooming flowers, basking in the bright, clear glow of golden hour sunlight that defines her silky straight black hair. She wears a form-fitting backless evening gown featuring intricate brass gears and lace accents, designed to accentuate her slim waist and curves, with the deep open back revealing smooth skin. Caught in a candid, joyful moment, she is laughing softly while playfully fixing her windblown hair with one hand and holding a delicate champagne glass in the other. The image utilizes Bleach bypass color grading for high contrast and low saturation, shot on Sony A7R IV with an 85mm f/1.4 GM lens to create a creamy bokeh background, employing depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination for hyper-detailed clarity.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
